title: (the devil's in the detail) SBI need not to reveal who donated how much to whom
selftext:
Tomorrow when SBI gives the data to EC we will only know

-who bought the bonds, when & how much.
-which party encashed, when & how much.

That’s all.

Who gave to whom won’t be known tomorrow (12th March 2024)
comments: corelate with majority of money went to bjp. you'll have your answers.
everyone gets the piece of pie, bjp is in power so they get bigger. if congress will be in the power they would get too.
bjp got higher share since 2008 even when they were not in power. that is how they fuelled the mega advertising campaigns for Modi.
